short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is an extension for configuring IOT wire-less or wireed modules  such as Zig-Bee, BLE, Sub-1, LORA and CAN & MOD Bus devicesâ€¦

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is an extension for configuring IOT wire-less or wireed modules  such as Zig-Bee, BLE, Sub-1, LORA and CAN & MOD Bus devices with any version of Hi-Gate (An IOT Gateway).
